nodes.text: Pad was a Human mercenary and a non-Force sensitive member of the Brotherhood of Darkness. Pad fled from the Seventh Battle of Ruusan after the Army of Light managed to break through the Brotherhood's defenses, and returned to the Sith camp. While scavenging treasures and supplies, the group of mercenaries Pad was with was attacked by Darth Bane.
Pad was killed, along with Derrin, as they stood guard at the Sith camp by a direct lightsaber strike to the body.
